text: @BumbleBeeszy @GovRonDeSantis and HELL NO!!! Ron DeSantis has always been 3-steps behind on protocols and procedures. This has lead to thousands of deaths that could have been prevented. I know for a fact that @AndrewGillum would’ve handled the COVID-19 situation MUCH better!!
